Services¶

Authentication Service¶

Contacts Service¶

Contact management service.

Provides high-level CRUD operations and search functionality for contacts, delegating database interactions to ContactRepository.

class src.services.contacts.ContactService(db: sqlalchemy.ext.asyncio.AsyncSession)¶

Bases: object

Service layer for contact-related operations.

Parameters¶

dbAsyncSession

SQLAlchemy async session for database access.

async create_contact(body: src.schemas.ContactModel, user: User)¶

Create a new contact for the user.

async delete_contact(contact_id, user: User)¶

Delete a contact for the user.

async get_contact(contact_id: int, user: User)¶

Retrieve a specific contact by ID for the given user.

async get_contacts(skip: int, limit: int, user: User)¶

Retrieve a list of contacts for the user with pagination.

async get_upcoming_birthdays(user: User)¶

Get contacts with upcoming birthdays for the user.

async search_contact(first_name: str = None, second_name: str = None, email: str = None, user: User = None)¶

Search contacts by first name, second name, or email.

async update_contact(contact_id: int, body: src.schemas.ContactModel, user: User)¶

Update an existing contact for the user.

Email Service¶

File Upload Service¶

File upload service using Cloudinary.

Handles uploading user files (e.g., avatars) and returns the public URL.

class src.services.upload_file.UploadFileService(cloud_name, api_key, api_secret)¶

Bases: object

Service to upload files to Cloudinary.

Parameters¶

cloud_namestr

Cloudinary cloud name.

api_keystr

Cloudinary API key.

api_secretstr

Cloudinary API secret.

upload_file(file, username) → str¶

Upload a file to Cloudinary under a user-specific path.

Parameters¶

fileUploadFile

File object to upload.

usernamestr

Username to organize the file in a unique folder.

Returns¶

str

URL of the uploaded file.
